1028.question: How is the quality of singing voice measured?

3-Table1-1.png: Table 1: Automatic quality scores Is the input image and caption helpful to answer the following question. Answer in one word - Yes or No. Question: How is the quality of singing voice measured?.
The quality of singing voice is measured using the NCC score.

1028.answer:
Automatic: Normalized cross correlation (NCC)
Manual: Mean Opinion Score (MOS)
